FuncDef: This command sets the type of PCM for the designated PCM slot. This is not a mandatory configuration; however, by configuring a PCM type ofquad-pcm, this ensures the system will always monitor for the presence of PCM fan trays and will provide an indication if no PCM fan trays are detected.

ParaDef.Info: Identifies the PCM type installed in the PCM slot. Values-dual-pcm, quad-pcm.
